main.name: Erick Pena
main.description: I am a highly motivated student with a strong Computer Science background. I am very passionate about programming and I am always looking for new technologies to learn. Seek to pursue new position with room for advancement alongside growing team
main.bio: I am an enthusiastic person with a great passion for programming. This year I am graduating from the University of Central Florida with a bachelor’s degree in computer science and I think I am ready to put all of my learned skills to practice. Even though this is my last year as a student, I know there is a lot of new concepts and technologies that can be learned which make me see the future with excitement. Apart from programming some of the activities that keep me busy are learning to play the guitar and taking Portuguese lessons. Feel free to check my work and if you have any question don't hesitate to contact me.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: This is the school I am currently attending and where I have been able to solidify many of my skills. Some of my favorite courses I have taken are parallel computing, computer graphics, and artificial intelligence. Also, during my time here I have been part of the Dean’s List multiple occasions for maintaining a GPA above 3.8.
This is the first school I attended toward my degree and where I learned most of my programming fundamentals.

work.title: Software Developer
descriptions: I form part of a group of developers that is in charge to implement a cryptocurrency in a social media platform.
Collaborated with multiple developers on different tasks to complete milestones in time

work.title: Attraction Operator
descriptions: Deliver top quality customer service in professional manner while managing multiple tasks.
Ensure the proper use of safety practices and procedures while operating the attraction.
Evaluate and communicate with co-workers to meet goals and accomplish tasks.

check.title: Contacts Manger
check.description: This is a friendly responsive website that allows you to store all of your contacts in an organize manner. This project was developed with MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

check.title: Character Keep
check.description: This forms part of a group project where the application was responsible to generate, collect, and save data from tabletop games such as Warhammer. I was in charge to create the mobile component of the interactive application on Android with the use of Java.

check.title: 3D Cell Model
check.description: Develop in JavaScript with the use of Three.js, HTML, CSS, and Vectary. This is an interactive 3d project that allows users to learn the anatomy of an animal cell.

check.title: Atlantic Trails Resort
check.description: Developed with the use of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. This is a friendly responsive website used as the main online tool to represent a vacation Resort.

check.title: PL/0 Compiler
check.description: Develop in C, this program takes PL/0 instructions then it reads them character by character detecting any syntax errors, then it will parse it, and output the result from many of the logistics operations that was able to perform.

check.title: React Native Login System
check.description: This is an example of a project that I decided to create to explore and learn more about the React Native. To authenticate users I am using Google's Firebase tools to get familiar with their authentication system.
